quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因形近词“cosmetology”（美容学）的干扰将“cosmology”误判为“美容学”，或因词根“cosmos”+“-logy”的过度直译忽略其“学科”属性。
quiz_item.sentence: Stephen Hawking's work in **cosmology** revolutionized our understanding of the universe's origin and evolution.
